md:
giải nghĩa từ "healthiest" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Healthiest** (adjective)

* Meaning: in the best state of health; most healthy or wholesome.
* Vietnamese: khỏe nhất, lành mạnh nhất.

Example sentence: "Eating a balanced diet is the healthiest choice for your body."

Related words: healthy, wellness, fitness, nutrition.

Note: The suffix "-est" is used to form the superlative degree of an adjective, indicating the highest or most extreme degree of a quality. In this case, "healthiest" is the superlative form of "healthy", indicating the highest degree of health or wellness.

Healthiest (adjective)

  • Meaning: in the best state of health; most healthy or wholesome.
  • Vietnamese: khỏe nhất, lành mạnh nhất.

Example sentence: "Eating a balanced diet is the healthiest choice for your body."

Related words: healthy, wellness, fitness, nutrition.

Note: The suffix "-est" is used to form the superlative degree of an adjective, indicating the highest or most extreme degree of a quality. In this case, "healthiest" is the superlative form of "healthy", indicating the highest degree of health or wellness.
